title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to legendary broadcaster Jim Nantz who will call the Masters starting tomorrow, fresh off doing March Madness. ESPN's Dan Orlovsky explains what the Eagles need to do to overtake the Cowboys in the NFC East. And Mavs owner Mark Cuban discusses what he'd do to fix the appeal of baseball to new fans.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to legendary broadcaster Jim Nantz who will call the Masters starting tomorrow, fresh off doing March Madness. ESPN's Dan Orlovsky explains what the Eagles need to do to overtake the Cowboys in the NFC East. And Mavs owner Mark Cuban discusses what he'd do to fix the appeal of baseball to new fans.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
